images.alt_text: AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a scenic view of Thai beaches with autumn elements.
AI-selected These images will highlight the beauty of Thailand's beaches and cultural sites, showcasing local festivals, street food, and tropical landscapes.

AI-selected This pattern will be used as a background to create a vibrant and tropical atmosphere throughout the email.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting Thai beaches, autumn festivals, and a sense of escape to a warm destination

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the beauty of Thai beaches and cultural sites
assetRequirements.content_context: featuring local festivals, street food, and tropical landscapes

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Тайские мечты ждут вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a scenic view of Thai beaches with autumn elements.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
